string.value: This device is not yet authorized for Adobe DRM content.
This device is authorized for reading Adobe DRM content.
This device is authorized for reading and purchasing Adobe DRM content.

Do you want to DELETE all content, restore all factory settings, and clear the DRM authorization state?
Yes - Press the "OPTIONS" button No - Press the "HOME" button
The Reader is unable to charge as no power supply is being detected. Please check that the charger is plugged in and switched on or that the USB cable is correctly connected.
The Reader is currently experiencing extreme temperatures and is unable to charge. Please return the Reader to normal room temperature and retry.
The rechargeable battery requires service. Please contact customer support.

Your Reader needs to be reset. To do this, insert a pin into the "RESET" button on the bottom and then slide and release the "POWER" switch. If you continue to see this message on-screen, please contact Sony Customer Support.
continue to see this message on-screen, please contact customer support.
Choose your preferred language and select "OK". Note: The device settings can be changed from the "Settings" menu at a later time.
Are you sure you want to restore the default settings?
Are you sure you want to format the internal memory? Warning: All content and notes will be deleted.
Are you sure you want to format the Memory Stick™ card? Warning: All content and notes will be deleted.
Are you sure you want to format the SD card? Warning: All content and notes will be deleted.
Are you sure you want to delete this book?
Unable to delete book. Tap "OK" to return to the book list.
Are you sure you want to clear the keyboard history?
Are you sure you want to completely power off (shutdown) the device?
Tap "Yes" to start the touch screen calibration.
This setting is not available in demo mode.
This feature is not available in demo mode.
Using the stylus, tap on the center of the target.
Calibration error detected. Please restart calibration process.
Choose your preferred default dictionary and select "OK". Note: The device settings can be changed from the "Settings" menu at a later time.
Do not remove the Memory Stick™ card.
Do not remove the SD card.
Are you sure you want to delete the bookmark?
Note: This page contains a bookmark in more than one text size. All bookmarks on this page will be removed if you proceed.
Are you sure you want to delete the bookmark?
Note: This page contains a bookmark with a note in more than one text size. All bookmarks and notes on this page will be removed if you proceed.
Are you sure you want to delete the bookmark and associated note?
Are you sure you want to delete the highlight and associated note?
Do you want to continue searching from the end of the content?
Do you want to continue searching from the beginning of the content?
Are you sure you want to delete the bookmark and associated note?
Are you sure you want to delete the highlight and associated note?
The changes will not be saved. Continue anyway?
The changes will not be saved. Continue anyway?
Are you sure you want to delete?
Are you sure you want to delete this drawing?
Are you sure you want to delete this memo?
The changes will not be saved. Continue anyway?
The changes will not be saved. Continue anyway?
The changes will not be saved. Continue anyway?
The changes will not be saved. Continue anyway?
No entry found. Press XXBUTTONXX to enter a word manually or Press "OPTIONS" to select another dictionary.
No entry found. Please check the entered word.
Are you sure you want to delete this issue?
Unable to delete issue. Tap "OK" to return to the issue list.
Choose where to create a collection:
Are you sure you want to delete the selected item(s)?
Are you sure you want to delete the selected item(s) including pictures chosen for display on the standby screen?
This book is protected. Are you sure you want to delete this book?
Are you sure you want to delete this protected issue?
This memo is protected. Are you sure you want to delete this memo?
This drawing is protected. Are you sure you want to delete this drawing?
How many issues from this subscription do you want to store on your Reader?
Note: Older issues will be deleted unless they are protected.
Are you sure you want to delete the extra issue(s) now?
This feature is disabled because the "Create/Edit" notes toolbar is shown. Please close this toolbar to enable this feature.
This feature is disabled because you are in "2 Page View". Please change to "1 Page View" to enable this feature.
This feature is disabled because you are in "2 Page View" and using the "Create/Edit" notes tool bar. Please change to "1 Page View" and close the tool bar to enable this feature.
No dictionary has been selected. Please go to the "Settings" tab and select your dictionary.
"Wireless Standby" sets the wireless feature in standby mode when the network is idle for ten minutes. Turn "On" to increase battery life and turn "Off" to improve connection time.
This feature is not available while downloading content. Please try again after the download is complete.
The Reader Store cannot be accessed because the "WIRELESS" switch is turned off. Please turn it on and try again.

Unable to access the Reader Store. The Reader is not connected to either a valid Wi-Fi network or a mobile network. Please try accessing the Reader Store again when the device is connected to one of the above networks.
The Reader Store cannot be accessed because the "Date and Time" setting or "Time Zone" setting is incorrect. Please correct them from the "Settings" tab and try again.
Your SIM card is not recognized. Please contact Sony Customer Support.
The Reader cannot connect to a mobile network because it is locked by a PIN or PUK code. Please contact Sony Customer Support.
Unable to download content because the "WIRELESS" switch on the Reader is in the "OFF" position.
To download content, slide the switch to the "ON" position and when connected to a network, go to "Applications" > "Purchased Content" or "Google Books" if downloading public domain books.
Unable to download content because the network connection is no longer active.
You can download content when the Reader is connected to a network by going to "Applications" > "Purchased Content" or "Google Books" if downloading public domain books.
Unable to download content because one or both of the "Date and Time" and "Time Zone" settings are incorrect.
To download content, please make any necessary corrections then go to "Applications" > "Purchased Content" or "Google Books" if downloading public domain books.
Unable to download content because there is not enough internal memory space.
Please delete unnecessary files then go to "Applications" > "Purchased Content" or "Google Books" if downloading public domain books.
You can try downloading again by going to "Applications" > "Purchased Content" or "Google Books" if downloading public domain books.

An error occurred while accessing the wireless feature. Please shut down your Reader by pressing the "RESET" button at the bottom of the device and then turn the Reader back on by using the "POWER" switch.
Currently connecting to the network. Download will begin after connection is established.
An error occurred while accessing the wireless feature. Please wait for the wireless status icon in the status bar to display "STBY", then turn the WIRELESS switch off and then turn it back on again.
This Memory Stick™ card may have been damaged. Please try another Memory Stick™ card.
This SD card may have been damaged. Please try another SD card.
Due to a Memory Stick™ card error, your Reader profile cannot be saved to the device. Please try another Memory Stick™ card.
Due to an SD card error, your Reader profile cannot be saved to the device. Please try another SD card.
The Memory Stick™ card is read-only and your Reader profile cannot be saved to the device. Please try another Memory Stick™ card.
Due to a Memory Stick™ card error, your Reader profile cannot be saved to the device. Please try another Memory Stick™ card.
Due to an SD card error, your Reader profile cannot be saved to the device. Please try another SD card.
The Memory Stick™ card needs to be formatted. Please go to the Settings tab and format the Memory Stick™ card.
The SD card needs to be formatted. Please go to the Settings tab and format the SD card.
This file is corrupted and cannot be opened.
Because the Memory Stick™ card is locked, your Reader profile cannot be saved to the device. Please eject the Memory Stick™ card, unlock it and re-insert it.
Because the SD card is locked, your Reader profile cannot be saved to the device. Please eject the SD card, unlock it and re-insert it.
There is not enough free space available to save your Reader profile or a screenshot to the device. Please delete one or more files and try again.
The file cannot be opened. The file format is not supported.
The file cannot be played. The file format is not supported.
This Memory Stick™ card is protected. Please try another Memory Stick™ card.
The Reader has detected an error with the battery and it can no longer be charged. The Reader will now shut down. Please replace with the new dedicated battery and turn on the "POWER" switch.
If this message still appears after exchanging the battery, please contact Sony Customer Support.
The Reader has detected that the battery has been removed and will now shut down. Please insert the battery and turn on the "POWER" switch.

The book you're trying to access cannot be opened on this device because of DRM issues. If you purchased this book previously, please download it from "Applications" > "Purchased Content". Otherwise, you will need to purchase the book in order to access it.
When set "On", the Reader enters sleep mode after 10 minutes of inactivity and powers off after 3 days of continuous sleep mode.
Select your preferred method to turn pages. The arrow pointing left means that you swipe the touch screen to the left while the arrow pointing right means swiping the touch screen to the right.
Slide duration can be set to up to 60 seconds. The slideshow menu can be found by pressing "OPTIONS" within the Pictures application.
When device lock is set "On", it is required to enter the pass code whenever the Reader is turned on. Be sure to turn off "Device Lock" before connecting to your computer.
You have 0 periodicals on your Reader. Tap the "Store" tab to browse and purchase periodicals.
This drawing has become corrupted and cannot be opened.
Reader is in sleep mode. Slide and release the power switch to wake up.
The "Page Mode" will be restored to "Original".
The "Create/Edit" notes screen will be closed.
By selecting "On" for "Show picture", selected pictures are displayed in sleep mode. When selecting "On" for "Show message", messages about how to wake up the Reader are displayed.
Select screen rotation direction when "Orientation" is selected in the "OPTIONS" menu.
The specified collection name already exists. Please enter another name.
Are you sure you want to proceed? Actual content will remain undeleted.
Are you sure you want to proceed? Actual content will remain undeleted.
The selected dictionary will be changed From: %CUR_DIC% To: %NEW_DIC%
Applying settings... Please wait a moment.
Cannot select because the maximum of 99 pictures that can be selected on the Memory Stick™ card has been reached. Please unselect a picture on the Memory Stick™ card and select this picture again.
Cannot select because the maximum of 99 pictures that can be selected on the SD Card has been reached. Please unselect a picture on the SD Card and select this picture again.
Cannot select because the maximum of 99 pictures that can be selected on the Internal Memory has been reached. Please unselect a picture on the Internal Memory and select this picture again.
There are no items in this list. Please refer to the User Guide for information on how to add content.
There are no items in this list.
This book is currently set to hide notes. Do you want to display the notes?
No entry found. XXBUTTON1XX for manual search XXBUTTON2XX for search in another dictionary.
Cannot select because the maximum of 99 pictures that can be selected on each of the Memory Stick™ card and the SD Card has been reached.
Cannot select because the maximum of 99 pictures that can be selected on each of the Memory Stick™ card and the Internal Memory has been reached.
Cannot select because the maximum of 99 pictures that can be selected on each of the SD Card and the Internal Memory has been reached.
Cannot select because the maximum of 99 pictures that can be selected on each of the Memory Stick™ card, the SD Card and the Internal Memory has been reached.
This content is protected. Unprotect the content before deletion.
There is no content in the storage where the specified collection exists. To add a content, the physical location of both content and collection must be the same.

It is required that either "Wi-Fi" or "Mobile Network" be set to "On". If you wish to turn off both Wi-Fi and Mobile Network, slide the "WIRELESS" switch (at the bottom of the Reader) to the "OFF" position.

The Reader is not connected to a Wi-Fi or Mobile network. To configure a Wi-Fi network on the Reader, tap Settings > Wi-Fi Network Settings, then select an available Wi-Fi network. To connect to a Mobile network you must be within range of a valid network.
When the Reader is connected to either a Wi-Fi or Mobile network, press Retry to access the information you were trying to acquire.
A Wi-Fi network has not been configured on the device. Press "Settings" to go to the "Wi-Fi Network Settings" screen where an available network can be configured.
Wi-Fi is currently turned off. Press "Settings" to go to the "Wireless Controls" screen. Set the Wi-Fi feature to on.
The Browser is available only when connected to a Wi-Fi network. To configure an available network, press the "Settings" button to go to the "Wi-Fi Network Settings" screen.

The Browser is available only when connected to a Wi-Fi network. Currently, a Wi-Fi network is not configured on the device. To configure an available network, press the "Settings" button to go to the "Wi-Fi Network Settings" screen.
Please read carefully before using the web browser.

Internet Browser User License Agreement
Use of the Reader's limited Internet Browser requires Wi-Fi® access. Wi-Fi access may NOT be available at your location, free of charge, or free from interruption or disconnections. See your Wi-Fi provider for details. The Internet Browser may not support all Wi-Fi access points or websites. Functionality and display capabilities may be limited. Sony makes no representations or warranties regarding the links to and/or the use of any websites or the availability of content at any such websites. During use you must comply with all applicable laws and license restrictions. Browsing websites, accessing and/or downloading programs or data may result in viruses, loss of data, or other problems. Use of the Internet Browser is at your own risk. THE INTERNET BROWSER IS SUPPLIED "AS IS" AND WE MAKE NO REPRESENTATIONS, CONDITIONS OR WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS, IMPLIED, STATUTORY, OR OTHERWISE, THAT THE INTERNET BROWSER OR ANY WEBSITES WILL BE FIT FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE OR USE, OR TO THE QUALITY OF THE INTERNET BROWSER, OR OF THAT PURPOSE OR USE. TO THE EXTENT ALLOWED BY APPLICABLE LAWS OR REGULATIONS, SONY ELECTRONICS INC. AND/OR ITS AFFILIATED COMPANIES DISCLAIM ANY AND ALL LIABILITY FOR ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE TO YOU, YOUR DEVICE OR SOFTWARE, YOUR DATA, OR TO ANY THIRD PARTY, OR FOR LOSS OR DAMAGE CAUSED BY THE USE OF THE INTERNET BROWSER, WHETHER OR NOT SUCH LOSS OR DAMAGE IS THE RESULT OF DIRECT OR INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL USE OF THE INTERNET BROWSER. When using the Internet Browser you agree to respect the intellectual property rights of others. See other terms and conditions of use in your user manual.
Encryption Key field is empty. Are you sure you want to finish setting?
Encryption Key entered is incorrect for the selected security method. Are you sure you want to finish setting?
Connection Name entered is already in use. Please try entering another name.
Security method has been changed. It is recommended that a new Encryption Key is set.
Maximum number of Wi-Fi Network configurations have been reached. Please delete unused access points and try again.

Cannot scan or connect to Wi-Fi network. The wireless setting is currently set to "Off". Press "OK" to switch on Wi-Fi and continue. You can change this setting later from the "Wireless Controls" setting screen.
Cannot scan or connect to Wi-Fi network. The device's "WIRELESS" switch is currently in the "OFF" position. Please slide the "WIRELESS" switch to the "ON" position then press "OK" to continue.

Wireless LAN routers with the WPS push-button configuration feature make it easy to set-up a network. "WPS PIN Method" also makes it easy to set-up if you cannot use WPS push-button configuration. Please refer to the router manufacturer's instructions for more details.
Cannot scan or connect to Wi-Fi network. No network is found.
Do you want to go back to the Web Browser?
Are you sure you want to delete this Wi-Fi network?
Please press the WPS button on your router within two minutes.
Please wait. The device is currently exchanging information with the router.
Please use the following PIN code for the wireless LAN router. Then press "OK" to proceed.
Cannot add additional bookmarks because bookmark limit has been reached. Limit is 50 bookmarks. Please delete one or more bookmarks in order to add new bookmarks.
The web page cannot be accessed. Please retry when the device is connected to a Wi-Fi network.
The web page cannot be accessed because the "WIRELESS" switch on the device is turned off. Please switch it to the "ON" position and try connecting again.
The changes you made will not be accepted if you continue. Continue anyway?
Checking for latest system software update/s...
The "WIRELESS" switch on the Reader is currently set to the "OFF" position. To enable the wireless function, slide the "WIRELESS" switch to the "ON" position.
A Mobile or Wi-Fi network is currently not available. Please try connecting again when the Reader is in range of a valid network.
System software is up to date.
Device is downloading latest system software...
There is not enough battery power to update the system software. Please charge the battery then try again by tapping "Settings" > "System Management", and selecting "Check for Updates".

There is not enough space available in the Reader's internal memory for the software update. Please delete unwanted content from the Reader's memory to make more space available. You can then try again by tapping "Settings" > "System Management", and selecting "Check for Updates".

Failed to connect to a valid Wi-Fi network. Please make sure that a valid Wi-Fi network is available and that the device's Wi-Fi setting is set to the On position. You can then check for available updates by tapping "Settings" > "System Management", and selecting "Check for Updates".
A network error occurred during download. Please make sure you are connected to a network then try downloading again by tapping on "Settings", "System Management", then selecting "Check for Updates".

Download complete. Please read the following License Agreement carefully before updating the system software. When you press the "Accept" button, the device will shut down, restart, and then begin the system software update process.
An error occurred during updating. Please try downloading again by tapping on "Settings", "System Management", then selecting "Check for Updates".
The screenshot was saved successfully. You can view screenshots within the "Applications" > "Pictures" screen.
Downloading will be interrupted. Continue anyway?

Your Reader's Wi-Fi feature provides you with access to services that are not available through a 3G connection.
Wi-Fi also provides a high speed connection to the Reader Store, allowing for faster browsing and downloading of content.
For these reasons, we highly recommend you set up your Reader to connect to a wireless LAN router in your home and/or any Wi-Fi service to which you have access.
You can set up a Wi-Fi network at anytime by going to "Settings" > "Wi-Fi Network Settings".
The device will now shut down, restart, and then begin the system software update process.
Invalid character(s) entered. Allowable characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, ! " # $ % & ' ( ) * + , - . / : ; < = > ? @ [ \ ] ^ _ { | } ~ `
SSID must be less than or equal to 32 characters long.
Connection Name must be less than or equal to 64 characters long.
Invalid character(s) entered. Allowable characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, ! " # $ % & ' ( ) * + , - . / : ; < = > ? @ [ \ ] ^ _ { | } ~ `

The encryption key length is invalid. The correct key lengths are:
hexadecimal: 10 or 26 digits alphanumeric: 5 or 13 characters

The encryption key length is invalid. The correct key lengths are:
hexadecimal: 64 digits alphanumeric: 8 - 63 characters

Failed to connect. Please check the following: 1. A Wi-Fi signal is available. 2. The device's "WIRELESS" switch is set to the "ON" position. 3. The "Wi-Fi"setting in the "Settings" > "Wireless Controls" screen is set to "On". 4. Reader connection settings for Wi-Fi are correctly set.
Failed to configure Wi-Fi network. Configuration process may have timed out.
Failed to configure Wi-Fi network. Configuration process may have timed out or PIN code may have been entered incorrectly.
Cannot connect to this Wi-Fi network because the security method for this network is not supported.
The following change has been made to the Wi-Fi network. Please reconnect.
Proxy server address must be less than or equal to 255 characters.
Invalid character(s) entered. Please use only digits 0 through 9.

This website's security certificate is not issued by a trusted authority.
Communication with this site may not be secure; continuing is not recommended.

This website's security certificate was issued for a different website.
Communication with this site may not be secure; continuing is not recommended.
This website's security certificate has either expired or is not yet valid. Also, please make sure that the device's "Date and Time" settings are correct.

This website's security certificate has a problem.
Communication with this site may not be secure; continuing is not recommended.
Cannot display the following page because it is not supported.
Cannot open this file. The file format is not supported.
Leaving the non-secure page to go to the secure page.
Leaving the secure page to go to the non-secure page.
An error accessing the website has occurred. You will be returned to the "Home" screen. Please try again.
Please input IP address, subnet mask and default gateway.
Port must be equal to or less than 65535.
Failed to configure Wi-Fi network. Connection wait time has expired or WPS button for multiple wireless LAN routers may have been pushed.
Device is not connected to a network.
Note: if you wish to set the IP address setting to "Manual", then you must also set the DNS server to "Manual" (if it is currently set to "Auto") and then input the necessary DNS information.
Invalid web address. Please check the address and try again.

The next time the device attempts to connect to this Wi-Fi network, the DNS server will be set automatically. Also, if the "IP Address" is set to "Manual", the setting will automatically be changed to "Auto".
Connection has been terminated. Please make sure that the device's "WIRELESS" switch is in the "ON" position and try connecting again.
You will automatically receive updates like book and periodical recommendations, special promotions and exclusive offers from Reader Store on your Reader's "Home" screen.
Cannot connect to a network. Please check the following: 1) The Reader is within a network service area. 2) Confirm you are using the SIM card provided with your Reader.
The network feature could not be turned on because remaining battery power is too low. Please charge the battery before attempting to connect again.

Cannot confirm connection to either the Internet or the Reader Store. Please check the following: 1) The connection settings between the device and the wireless LAN router. 2) The wireless network is running properly.

The wireless network the device is connected to requires user authentication. Please open the device's Browser by tapping "Applications", then "Browser". The Wi-Fi network provider's sign-on page will appear. You can enter your user ID and Password in the appropriate fields for authentication.

Cannot connect to a network. The mobile network is currently set to "Off" and no Wi-Fi network is set-up on this device. Please set "Mobile Network" to the "On" position in the "Wireless Controls" screen or set up a Wi-Fi connection in the "Wi-Fi Network Settings" screen and try again.
The network feature is turned off because remaining battery power is too low. Please charge the battery before attempting to connect again.
Invalid web address. Please check the address and try again.

Cannot connect to a network. The mobile network is currently set to "Off" and no Wi-Fi network is configured on this Reader. Please set "Mobile Network" to the "On" position in the "Wireless Controls" screen or configure a Wi-Fi connection in the "Wi-Fi Network Settings" screen.

Low Battery!
The network features have been turned off to conserve power. Please charge the battery before attempting to connect again.
You are in the latest position across all your devices.
You are currently on Page %current_page%. The last read position is %server_page% at %date%. Would you like to go to that page?
This content does not support Synchronization.
To use this feature, you need to Sign-in first.

The Page Sync function synchronizes reading-related information like bookmarks, notes, and current page across your compatible reading devices.
Note: Handwritten notes and drawings cannot be synced.
The menu cannot be displayed because the maximum number of menu items the browser can show has been exceeded.

Cannot connect to a network. Please check that either a valid Wi-Fi network is configured in the "Wi-Fi Network Settings" screen, or the "Mobile Network" is in the "On" position in the "Wireless Controls" screen.
Note: If the link being accessed is for anything other than the Reader Store, it can only be accessed via Wi-Fi.

The page cannot be displayed.
A network error occurred. Please check the following settings: 1) The device's "WIRELESS" switch is in the "ON" position. 2) The "Mobile Network"/"Wi-Fi" network setting in the "Wireless Controls" screen is turned on.

The page cannot be displayed.
DNS error occurred. Your request could not be processed because an error occurred contacting the DNS server. Please select the "OPTIONS" menu to go to the home page.

The page cannot be displayed.
A network port error occurred. The network port is restricted. Please select the "OPTIONS" menu to go to the home page.

The page cannot be displayed.
A security error occurred. This web site has a security problem. Please select the "OPTIONS" menu to go to the home page.
The Sync function is currently set to the "Off" position. To turn on Sync, tap the "Settings" button then on the next screen, tap "On".
Cannot download content. You can download this content only when the device is connected to a Wi-Fi network.
The page you are trying to access is available only when connected to a Wi-Fi network. To configure an available network, press the "Settings" button to go to the "Wi-Fi Network Settings" screen.

The page you are trying to access is available only when connected to a Wi-Fi network. Currently, a Wi-Fi network is not configured on the device. To configure an available network, press the "Settings" button to go to the "Wi-Fi Network Settings" screen.

Download failed. Please make sure you are connected to a Wi-Fi network then try downloading again by tapping on "Settings", "System Management", then selecting "Check for Updates". It is necessary that the device is connected to a Wi-Fi network to download software.

The Reader is unable to connect because at least one of the following settings are incorrect: 1) "Date and Time" 2) "Time Zone". You can make the correction within the "Settings" > "General Settings" screen.

Cannot connect to a network. Please check that at least one of the following settings are true:
(1) A valid Wi-Fi network is configured in the "Wi-Fi Network Settings" screen.
(2) The "Mobile Network" is in the "On" position in the "Wireless Controls" screen.
The page cannot be accessed because the "WIRELESS" switch on the device is turned off. Please switch it to the "ON" position and try connecting again.
The page cannot be accessed. Please retry when the device is connected to a Wi-Fi network.
Do you want to go back to the Browser?
Sorry, this link is currently unavailable.
The action you are trying to perform will cancel the sync function. Do you want to continue?
A script on this page may be busy. Do you want the script to continue processing the page?
Do you want to go back to the book you were reading?
If the network you're connecting to requires a security key (also called a WEP/WPA key or network key) select “Encryption Key” to enter the information.

The required Encryption Key has not been entered.
Please enter the Encryption Key.

The encryption Key Entered is incorrect.
Please enter the correct Encryption Key.
